text: Hantu Bongkok or Bès Bungkok female type Nenek Bongkok is mythological bloodthirsty creature/ghost/evil spirit predating the colonial era in Palembang Indonesia, translates Humpback spirit.https://hantupedia.com/legenda-hantu-bongkok-edwin-van-brower-di- jantung-kota-palembang/ == References == ==External sites== * (Twitter) As featured in GeGeGe no Kitarō animation/tv cartoon series Category:Indonesian legendary creatures
title: Hantu Bongkok
